definition: to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
surname Tan
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
day/sky/heaven
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]

sentences.english: Always thought that to understand a lot of their own, chat all day, pretend to be thou.
sentences.chinese: 總以爲自己懂很多，整天談天說地，自命清高。

sentences.english: The middle octagonal court, there are a few people chatting.
sentences.chinese: 中間的八角庭裏有幾個人在談天說地。

sentences.english: We crouched on the sofa, shooting the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 我們蜷在沙發裏談天說地。

sentences.english: We are together, in your house, talk of everything under the sun, boasting a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 我們在一起，在你的小屋裏，談天說地，吹牛打虎。

sentences.english: On the other side of the bar, a group of chutes were standing and chatting happily.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的另一端，站著一羣胖子，高興地談天說地。

sentences.english: Old people talks of everything below shade.
sentences.chinese: 老年人談天說地樹蔭下。

sentences.english: As the movie came to an end the room filled with chatter.
sentences.chinese: 電影結束後，房間充滿了談天說地的閒聊。

sentences.english: I very much like talking to you and I consider you my new friend.
sentences.chinese: 我把你作爲我的新朋友，非常希望能和你談天說地。

definition: to reminisce/to talk about former times
to talk about everything
(of relations) joyous and harmonious
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
to relieve boredom or melancholy/a diversion
to whisper
to chat
to tease/to poke fun at
phonograph or radio (old term)/chatterbox/talkative person
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom
to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits/full of zest
to harangue/loud arrogant talk/to spout
hanging one's head dispiritedly (idiom); dejected/crestfallen
as if nothing had happened (idiom); calmly/nonchalantly
